name: Overcharge
description: When casting a Lightning Spell, give yourself an aura of plasma that exposes the weakness of your foes for 2 turns. All foes within 2 spaces of you always take effective damage if they are a Flying, Riding, or Armored Unit. If there are foes within 2 spaces that are Infantry, they suffer -20 Avo instead.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
